Header.title: Welcome!!
Header.paragraph: Thank you for visiting Stomski dot com! This site (for the time being) is dedicated to displaying and facilitating Bobby Stomski web development services, please find out more below!

About.paragraph: Blending a passion for technology with a background in teaching Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu has led me to an exciting career in software engineering. Mentoring martial arts students honed my skills in spatial thinking, communication, time management, and teamwork, all while shaping what would become a unique approach to analytical problem-solving in tech.
Why2: Brown belt in Brazilian Jiu Jitsu
Red Cross Everyday Heroes Award Recipient

Services.text: Experience in a fast pace team environment, simultaneously developing a diverse codebase.

Services.name: React/Redux
Services.text: Diverse BOM and state management implimentation experience.

Services.name: Unique Experience
Services.text: I bring a very unique background and skillset to the tech sector, please reach out if there is anything I can do to assist your team in its goals!

Features.title: Diverse Background
Features.text: Bringing a unique blend of technical expertise and broad life experiences to software engineering.

Features.title: Well-Rounded Skills
Features.text: Proficient in various programming languages with a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development.
